page.title: 18Bureside Youth Club
page.content: An open meeting will take place on Wednesday Sept. 11th in the Tithe Barn Horstead, to discuss the possibility of re-opening the Youth Club. It is hoped that many interested people will attend, and that these would include young people, parents and other interested adults. The Chairman of this meeting will be Les Gosling, who is our Divisional Youth and Community Officer from whom we can expect practical help and support. Items on the agenda will include; 1. Night of Youth Club meeting 2. Age range of Club 3. Adequate staffing arrangements There will be a display of photographs and leaflets relating to Youth Club activities in the area. With the breakdown of public transport it is important that we have facilities for our young people.
